author: David Gilbert, chloe angyal
title: Missouri Is Trying to Sue China and Its Communist Party For Lying About Coronavirus
description: There's just one problem: international law experts say it's not legally possible to just sue China.
content:
Want the best of VICE News straight to your inbox? Sign up here.
 The state of Missouri has filed a lawsuit against China alleging they lied to the world about the coronavirus.
 The lawsuit, filed Tuesday by Republican Attorney General Eric Schmitt, alleges… [+2528 chars]
